name: orcomdd
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: syl6(w0, w1, wo(w2, w3), wo(w3, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w3, w2)))
-| wi(wo(w3, w2), wo(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w3, w2)))
-| wi(wo(w3, w2), wo(w2, w3))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wo(w3, w2)))

comment: Commutativity of logic disjunction, in double deduction form. Should not be moved to main, see PR #3034 in Github. Use ~ orcomd instead. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 19-Mar-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
